isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - INTERNATIONAL 530E I6 HEUI ENGINES - OPERATION - Coolant Level Probe

svcproc.title: Coolant Level Probe
svcproc.para: The low coolant level probe is connected through connector (400-A) and circuit 34B to CEC module connector (379). A signal from the ECM is sent to the probe on this circuit. The other side of the probe is connected to chassis ground. When coolant level is below the probe, the circuit resistance changes, indicating to the ECM that the coolant level is below the critical level.
